messages.message: Is anyone else having performance issues with Refiner? ~3 seconds to perform any operation
Looking into it. This on prod, dogfood, or both?

Also, would you guess this is backend performance (running fields, saving program) or frontend performance (clicking anything in UI). I have a simple refiner open currently and am not noticing anything off
ah, I missed these comments as we were DMing. Thanks for filing a ticked and triaging this
Curious did we resolve this, and any root cause?
No, it’s not resolved. My understanding is that its related to a front end change that we shipped

If you’d like to repro it, you can play around with this program: https://www.instabase.com/apps/refiner-v5/edit/ib_solutions/solutions/fs/Instabase%20Drive/poc/RBC/MCA/RBC_POC_MARCO/prog/refiner-60004-5-marx%20(2).ibrefiner
@Erick this could be an issue that was also observed at BofA
@shaunak do you have a link to the ticket? We're looking at this PR at the moment https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/15489
